```{One Way Anova Testing for each city}
LasVegas.aov <- aov(Date ~ Temp_Avg, data = LasVegas)
summary(LasVegas.aov)

Pahrump.aov <- aov(Date ~ Temp_Avg, data = LasVegas)
summary(Pahrump.aov)

Phoenix.aov <- aov(Date ~ Temp_Avg, data = LasVegas)
summary(Phoenix.aov)

FountainHills.aov <- aov(Date ~ Temp_Avg, data = LasVegas)
summary(FountainHills.aov)

SanDiego.aov <- aov(Date ~ Temp_Avg, data = LasVegas)
summary(SanDiego.aov)

Ramona.aov <- aov(Date ~ Temp_Avg, data = LasVegas)
summary(Ramona.aov)
 
```
